page.pg_title: Topics and objectives for this module

text_content.paragraph: Letâ€™s review the Learning Objectives for this lesson. After completing this module, you will be able to:

bullets.bullet: Save, rename, delete and rerun a saved search, and
Customize search results by sorting them by columns, and rearranging columns

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: In addition to providing you with some insights about the benefits of using the Wells/Sites tab, you will get a brief overview of the tab. Then, we will demonstrate how to define a Wells/Sites Details search and the different options available to you, to work with the search results.
After completing this module, you will be able to:

bullets.bullet: Save, rename, delete and rerun a saved search, and
Customize search results by sorting them by columns, and rearranging columns
